comment.author: 39967544@N00
comment._content: Strathaird exiting Sydney Heads, shepherded by the pilot vessel Captain Cook (II, built 1893) - pre 1939, when the third pilot vessel of that name took over.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: He must have been in a plane to get that shot.  I don't think you can get that angle from North Head.
